-- This file is part of the FreeToolBox / ZipCodesPlugin.
-- Use this file to create multi-country datapacks.
-- All lines represent a datapack, countries must be:
-- If you want to set the name of the datapack countries, just write it as first isocode.
-- Name must be more to 2chars. Don't create database with more than 3 countries.
-- Lines begining with -- or # are not processed. Please don't insert empty lines.
